name: Peoples Training and Research Centre
briefDescription: PTRC is an organization devoted to generate awareness on occupational health and Safety. It carries out exhibitions, training and workshops, lectures and seminars, diagnosis camps, research and documentation and advocacy.Peoples training and Research center is registered non-Government organization registered under Societies Registration Act , Bombay Public Trust Act and Foreign Contribution Registration Act. Donation to PTRC attracts  tax rebates under section 80-G of Income Tax ActOBJECTIVES:•	Promote and support efforts for safer technology in rural and urban set-up.•	Develop, design & execute training programs for capacity building for vulnerable, professional and other interested groups.•	Promote, support & organize diagnosis camps for occupational diseases.•	Prepare, produce and distribute educational material.•	Disseminate information through News Bulletin and other media.•	Networking with National and International organizations•	Generate awareness among masses on hazards at work.•	Advocacy for better laws and enforcement of legal provisions.•	Take up research on Occupational health conditions of workers in different economical sectors•	Extend legal counseling and support to the victims and take up welfare activities for the victims.
